oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from John Ray Moss to his wife Nancy Forgey Moss
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Lick Creek, Tenn., from John Ray Moss to his wife Nancy concerning his health and his hopes to receive a letter from home soon. Moss served in Co. I, 43rd Tenn. Infantry (5th East Tenn. Volunteers), CSA. The letter includes an image of the house that Moss plans to build his wife upon his return. The image is a large, hand-drawn drawing that includes a flag which reads "Liberty." On the back of this letter is a letter to his father, Green H. Moss.
